description:
Shaiapouf faces off against Morel while Menthuthuyoupi is up against Shoot and Knuckle.  As the various players begin their battles, the King, Netero, and Zeno also square off. Zeno uses his Nen ability Dragon Head on the King, but the King does not try to dodge.  What is the King`s objective?  The ultimate battle between the King and Netero is about to begin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Trennen x und x sich verrechnen
